channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 26, 09:30 - 15:30 UTC

Sep 6, 22:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 26/09/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 26/09/2024 15:30 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][VMware Private Cloud] - vRealize Operations (vRops) upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 16, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 20, 15:00 UTC

Sep 11, 20:09 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/09/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/09/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : vRops will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vRealize Operations (vRops).

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - Vmotion
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 16, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 20, 15:00 UTC

Sep 10, 18:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/09/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/09/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding

Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX2b][Storage] - Cluster2005 incident notification
item.description:
Sep 12, 11:34 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 12/09/2024 10:30 UTC
End time : 12/09/2024 11:05 UTC
User impact : Datastores on cluster2005 were temporarily unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2b
Root cause : This incident was due to hardware issue.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
